column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I've been here twice for lunch and this place is amazing. Food
column3: restrooms...it just can't be beat. I've had the grilled cheese and tomato soup. It's only $8 and more than enough food. Salads
column4: sandwiches and beer are delicious. The two servers I've had truly cared about our experience and didn't mind answering questions and bringing extra plates for sharing. Highly recommend.
